SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameController extends Object implements Serializable
The GameController class is responsible for managing the overall state, flow of the game and all the components that interact in the game It handles player actions, game state transitions, command execution, and game suspension This class works closely with the Game, Player, and TurnHandler classes to coordinate gameplay. It also interacts with the GigaController who manages interactions separately in multiple games and player initialization of a player in a specific game
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Player player, ResourceCard card, Face face, int x, int y)
      This method changes the player's manuscript, adding the selected card on it and possibly adding points on the board and then removes the card from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      player - which player performed the action
      card - which card is played
      face - face up or face down
      x - position index
      y - position index

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player player, boolean isGold, boolean fromDeck, int faceUpCardIndex)
      Draws a card for the player
      Parameters:
      player - The player drawing the card
      isGold - Whether the card is a gold card
      fromDeck - Whether the card is drawn from the deck
      faceUpCardIndex - The index of the face-up card.
